item.description:
Come out on again Sunday night to enjoy one of Boston's best bands - The Sea Monsters. These guys are fantastic! One of the best live performances I've ever seen. The style is an eclectic mix of alternative, jam band, blues, and funk featuring fantastic guitar work and a full horn section. To read a review of the band, go to:

http://gibgabboston.b....

Let's get together at 10:00PM for beer, then the band starts around 10:30PM. There's a $5.00 cover, all of which goes to the band.

I hope you'll join me for a fun time on a Sunday night.
item.how_to_find_us: Tall guy with a ponytail - just like my picture!
item.name: Sunday Funday After Hours: Live Music at The Precinct in Union Square
